message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I really like the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.

I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $125. I'm willing to pay $115 for it.

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great price, and I think you'll really appreciate the product!
I'm really interested in the product, but I think $130 is still a bit high. I'm willing to pay $118 for it.

I'm starting to get a little concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $125. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product!
